cheatsheet.title: Building a textual editor with Sintaks

intro.description:
This cheatsheet will guide you through the sources of a texteditor for Logo generated with Sintaks. It creates a textual concrete syntax for Logo
Once deployed, you get :
- a textual editor with syntax highlighting
- conversions model 2 text and text 2 model
- support for filename extension in eclipse

item.title: texteditor project
item.description: The project org.kermeta.kmlogo.texteditor contains all the sources of a texteditor for Logo

item.title: STS file
item.description: ASMLogo.sts file defines the mapping rules between the concepts in the Abstract Syntax Model and a concrete textual syntax. It is bidirectional and thus provides both model2text (prettyprinting) and text to model (parsing) transformations.

subitem.label: Have a look at its content

item.title: plugin extension
item.description: In order to integrate the editor in Eclipse, some extensions specific to Sintaks are needed.
